basic_info.description: Welcome to my world of creativity and learning! I'm G, and I'm excited to have you join me on this adventure. Currently, I'm a full-time student at Code Fellows, diving deep into the programming language JavaScript and honing my skills in the React library. I can't wait to infuse my creativity into my future projects

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: During Salmon Week, I took on the formidable task of creating a dynamic table to display cookie sales data by the hour and cities. Armed with basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills, each day presented its unique struggles as I aligned the project with provided prompts. Salmon Week refined my problem-solving skills and deepened my grasp of web development principles. Collaboration with peers fostered a supportive learning environment.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: In the initial week of my 301 course, I immersed myself in Bootstrap and React, tackling the creation of a website featuring rows of horned beast cards, each with a name and description. Leveraging prior project experiences, I grasped the efficiencies of React, simplifying complex coding tasks. Exploring React unveiled its simplicity and efficiency, enhancing my understanding of web development practices. I implemented interactive card displays, where user interaction would reveal individual details. Additionally, I incorporated filtering functionality based on the number of horns each beast possessed.
